## startCase variable

Converts a string, including strings in camelCase or snake\_case, into Start Case (a variant of Title Case where all words start with a capital letter), it keeps original single quote and hyphen in the word.

'management\_companies' to 'Management Companies' 'managementCompanies' to 'Management Companies' `hell's kitchen` to `Hell's Kitchen` `co-op` to `Co-op`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
startCase: (str: string) => string
```
